entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Vanderhoof
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:34 a.m. PDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High 13.
entry.summary: A few showers ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 this morning. High 13. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 15. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
